snippet.title: Pimp My Water Gun - Game Trailer - English
snippet.description:
A tile-based game of design. Get it on Google Play: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.clipland.games.pimpmywatergun.android



"Pimp My Water Gun" is like a model kit for water pistols. 🔫 Build your very own squirt gun from a collection of stock parts: water tanks, grips, water nozzles and more. Flip, rotate and arrange parts in arbitrary ways and get creative while building new and interesting or beautiful designs.


🌟 Your aim is to score a high "Coolness" rating. Parts and their logics have a meaning within your build. Reasonable designs with a high degree of customization beat uninspired builds.


For Android. Released October 4th, 2022
https://games.clipland.com/pimpmywatergun/
